thread.title: Berkshire Q2 profits drop 37% as investment gains decline
thread.title_full: Berkshire Q2 profits drop 37% as investment gains decline

title: Berkshire Q2 profits drop 37% as investment gains decline
text:
Content preferences Done 
Aug 7 (Reuters) - Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc said on Friday second-quarter profit fell 37 percent, reflecting a significant decline in investment gains and weaker results in its insurance operations. 
Net income for the Omaha, Nebraska-based insurance and investment company fell to $4.01 billion, or $2,442 per share, from $6.4 billion, or $3,889 per share, a year earlier. 
Quarterly operating profit fell 10 percent to $3.89 billion, or $2,367 per share, from $4.33 billion, or $2,634 per share. 
(Reporting by Jonathan Stempel in New York) Berkshire Hathaway Inc
